response.overview: Sookiri is a child who is very interested in computers. He belongs to a poor family and his father is a driver. The father drives the car of a rich person, whose son is also in the same class as Sookiri. They are good friends. Sookiri invents a new piece of computer equipment which needs a big sum of money to finish the project. He gets his rich friend to finish the project by buying the missing piece and gets him to enter the Sri Lanka's child inventor competition. But will Sookiri's invention win the competition?
response.title: Mouse
